name: kattsoftware/php-telephonify
description: Create IVR/phone robots/automated telephone applications/call-centers easy

suggest.ext-json: REQUIRED if you are using Nexmo
suggest.ext-dom: REQUIRED if you are using Twilio
suggest.nexmo/client: ^1.9 || ^2.0 (REQUIRED if you plan to create outgoing or change ongoing calls - see docs)
suggest.twilio/sdk: ^5.42 || ^6.1 (REQUIRED if you plan to create outgoing or change ongoing calls - see docs)
